description: This defines how to handle requests that cannot be executed right now.

queuing.description: The configuration parameters for queuing. This field may be non-empty only if `type` is '`Queue`'.

type.description: '`Queue`' means that requests that cannot be executed immediately are held in a queue until they can be executed or a queuing limit is reached. '`Reject`' means that requests that cannot be executed upon arrival are rejected.
